name: PlanetRealm DEMO
description:
Set in a beautiful world of colorful tiny planets, PlanetRealm takes you on a puzzle-solving treasure hunt through mysterious vines, mazes and forests.  Hop from planet to planet and keep your eyes peeled for clues unraveling the path to the legendary Hidden planet and it's lost fortune!

In an age long past, infamous Planet Hunter Olygoz stashed a dozen omnicores on one of the planets deep in unexplored parts of the planetary system and set up a series of puzzles so nobody but him could find it. Countless tried their luck, but all without exception failed, and the legend of Hidden planet and it's lost fortune was born...

Immerse yourself in distinct low-poly, cartoony looking world with relaxing atmosphere and variety of interesting puzzle mechanics. Planet-rotating and vine-activating mechanisms, maze planets, perspective puzzles... Many tried but none succeeded, will you be the first to solve them all?

Controls: Features:
  • 3D gameplay taken in a new dimension
  • Stunning low-poly world filled with colorful tiny planets
  • Mystery unraveling treasure hunt
  • Powerful mechanisms, capable of rotating entire planets
  • Vine-formed tunnels with distinct interplanetary travel experience
  • Relaxing ambient of the planetary system
Project Status:

Under development in spare time, currently in level design phase.
